text: This website is where all the Data Science learning happens!

title: About
text: Prior to studying MDS at UBC, Johnson Chuang is a visual effects artist working in Vancouver. He specializes in effects (FX) and 3D camera tracking (matchmove). He has worked at studios such as Disney, Sony, Image Engine, and Digital Domain. He is credited in movies such as Moana 2, Avengers: Infinity War, Super Pets, The Maze Runner and Elysium.
